title: Snapshots: Rainer Live at Sebright Arms 28th Nov
body:
RAINER performed at Sebright Arms to toast the launch of their impressive EP–Hope/Satin/Glass/Dreams.

Vocalist Rebekah Raa took the stage in a floor-length black sequined dress and barefeet. (A nice touch) The duo treated the audience to a new track, Water, that I’m very much looking forward to hearing soon. On film Rebekah gives off some very serious Roisin Murphy vibes. All the way down to the dancing.
